original: AHLBERG, Jöns Andersson, Färghandlare, Köping, f Ståstorp, Malmöh l, 26/1 78 av jvgsman A Olsson o Bengta Persson, gm Agnes Bergström. Eft slut skolstud prakt i målaryrk i Trelleborg 92—96, i Sv o utl 96—07. Verkm h A Bergman Kpg 07—14. övert aff und fma J A Ahlberg, Färg-, Tapet- & Kemikalieaffär, Köping, 14, inneh dna. Styr.led Kpgs Fabr- o hantv.frn, styr.suppl Mell Sv Tapethandl frn, led Mälardalens köpm.frb o ds garantifrn, Mell Sv Färghandl frn, Köpings Gamla hdlsfrn. Odd Fellow.
translated: AHLBERG, Jöns Andersson, Merchant, Köping, born in Ståstorp, Malmö County, on January 26, 1878, to railway worker A Olsson and Bengta Persson. Married to Agnes Bergström. After finishing school, he obtained practical training in painting in Trelleborg from 1892 to 1896, both in Sweden and abroad from 1896 to 1907. Worked at A Bergman's workshop in Köping from 1907 to 1914. Took over the business from J A Ahlberg, Paint, Wallpaper & Chemical Store, Köping, in 1914, sole owner. Board member of Köping's Factory and Craft Association, deputy board member of Central Swedish Wallpaper Merchants, member of Mälardalen Merchants Association and their guarantee committee, member of Central Swedish Paint Merchants Association, Köpings Gamla Trading Committee. Member of Odd Fellow.

structured.name: Jöns Andersson Ahlberg
structured.description: Merchant in Köping. Took over the business from J A Ahlberg, Paint, Wallpaper & Chemical Store, Köping, in 1914, becoming the sole owner.

career.occupational_title: Owner of J A Ahlberg, Paint, Wallpaper & Chemical Store
